ru.yandex.subtitles.service

Class MessagingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • ru.yandex.subtitles.service.MessagingService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, InitializerCallbacks, RecognitionListener, SpeakerListener

    public class MessagingService
extends android.app.Service
implements InitializerCallbacks, RecognitionListener, SpeakerListener
    Class that handles all message-related (recognition, vocalization, message sending, etc.) events.
